resources.string: You cannot pick more than 4 matchsticks!

1) There are a total of 21 matchsticks.

 2) Two players play the game and Player 1 gets to pick first.

 3) Players pick the matchsticks, turn by turn.

 4) Players must pick at least 1 matchstick in their turn, and cannot pick more than 4.

 5) Whoever gets to pick the last matchstick, loses.
If you pick all of them, you will lose! \n Leave the last one to win! :)
There are lesser matchsticks than what you want!
The computer has won! Try again by restarting from the home screen!
Computer has picked %1$d matchsticks.\n Now it is your turn
Player 1 has picked %1$d matchsticks.\n Now it is Player 2\'s turn
Player 2 has picked %1$d matchsticks.\n Now it is Player 1\'s turn
How many matchsticks do you want?
